page.title: 20BUILDING AGE
page.content: Name of Buildings Age Thura Place * 19 Thura Mains 85 years Auchorn Farm 56 Auchorn Square 26 'Ha' Bungalow 6 'Ha' cottage 130 Halcro cottage 60 Halcro bungalow 6 Old School 110 New School 10 Manse 'Lowood' 160 Manse Community Centre116 Brabsterdorran Farm 100 Smerral Farm 60 Church 165 The main type of buildings in Bower are farms, cottages and council bungalows. There are a lot of ruins and disused buildings in Bower Tower. Some disused buildings are being modernised and local people moving in.
